turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Power (2014 Kannada film).
turn.2: Power (2014 Kannada film) Power is a 2014 Indian Kannada-language action comedy film.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: It is a remake of the 2011 Telugu film "Dookudu" which itself was partially inspired from the 2003 German tragicomedy film "Good Bye, Lenin!". It was directed by K. Madesh and produced by Ram Achata, Gopichand Achanta, and Anil Sunkara for 14 Reels Entertainment.
turn.6: It features Puneeth Rajkumar and Trisha Krishnan in lead roles, alongside Rangayana Raghu, Prabhu, Kelly Dorjee, Sadhu Kokila in supporting roles.
turn.7: What was the story of the film?
turn.8: Krishna Prasad (Prabhu) is a politician driven by idealistic values and a sense of social service.
turn.10: His followers are his brother Sathya (Dharma), and supporters (Shobharaj, Sharath Lohitashwa).
turn.12: The people of Krishnanna's constituency elect him as a legislator.
